ComicInfo.Title: Our Final Hours
ComicInfo.Summary: Our Final Hours: Barbara Gordon, Damian, Black Canary, Harley Quinn, and Frankenstein continue their infiltration of Gotham to try to take out the king of the vampires, Dick Grayson. In Australia, Steel, Supergirl, and Jayna team up with Lobo to accomplish their mission, but Lobo quickly betrays them. Green Arrow, Grifter, and Swamp Thing plan to free the captives of the human blood farm in Smallville.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-20 01:13:40. [CVDB956132] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:48:22. [Issue ID 2454097]
ComicInfo.Writer: James Tynion IV,Matthew Rosenberg,James Tynion IV,Matthew Rosenberg
